name: WWF Raw
overview: Get RAW like never before! It's the ultimate 32X ringside slugfest: next-generation graphics, upgraded sound f/x, the hottest WWF superstars, mat-pounding new moves like the high impact powerslam, all new pins like the in-you-face "showboat" and more out-of-the ring, anything goes mayhem than any other game! Now more than ever...RAW IS WAR!
